author: Albert Schweitzer
message: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thomas Edison
message: Opportunity is missed by most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: In the end we retain from our studies only that which we practically apply.
title: Thought of the day
